annotations:
Dear All

 

Pls pps for our vessel as below:

 

MV

 PRINCESS MARIA  55K, OPEN JEBEL ALI 1-5TH/SEP,
BOD abt 500-600mt LSFO ; abt 40-50mt LSMGO,

 

TRY ANY INCLUDING PERIOD

HOLDS GRAIN CLEAN(DRYDOCK IN JUNE, 2024)

2*25MT, DECK/HATCH, GOA TRANSIT – OK

NICKEL ORE FRIENDLY

 

MV PRINCESS MARIA
SUMMER DWT - 55414 ON 12.87M
TPC - 57.1 ON SUMMER DWT
BUILT - JULY  2009
YARD - HYUNDAI VINASHIN, VIETNAM
HO/HA - 5 / 5
GEAR - 4 X 30 MT (HOOK) - 4 X 24 MT (GRAB) MACGREGOR ELECTRIC / HYDRAULIC
GRABS - 12.5 M3 CRANES MAY NOT BE USED IN HOOK MODE WITH GRABS ATTACHED.
LOA - 187.88 BEAM 32.26
CO2 FITTED / NO A60 BULKHEAD


SPEED/CONSUMPTION AS VESSEL TRADING AT OPEN SEA FOR 24 HOURS:
ABT 12.0 KNOTS BALLAST ABT 24.5 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
ABT 11.5 KNOTS LADEN ABT 25.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO


PORT IDLE : ABT 3.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
PORT WORKING : ABT 5.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO


"ABT” MEANS AN ALLOWANCE OF +/-0.5KN ON SPEED AND 5PCT ON CONSUMPTION 

 


ALL ABOVE SPEED/CONSUMPT
